main.name: Dhananjaya
main.bio: Hi there! I am Dhananjaya! I am a fresh graduate student at SLIIT who tries to complete any task in the best and most effective way by using the least resources and under any pressure. I am an energetic and ambitious software engineer with 6 months of experience. My interest is to learn new things as well as try to enhance myself up to a better state than I was.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.school: Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology - Sri Lanka
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Information Technology Specialising in Information Technology

work.title: Intern Software Engineer
work.description: Developing websites to facilitate easy client connections and effectively showcase company backgrounds involves implementing web applications using ReactJS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, and Spring Boot. These technologies enable the creation of responsive, visually appealing, and high-performance web applications that enhance user experience and engagement, ensuring a seamless interface between the company and its clients.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
